messages.subject: Glad you made their membership commit seppuku phil!
messages.msgSnippet: D****d spammers! I see you ve set the thing to moderate new member posts and made their membership commit seppuku. Let s hope that keeps them out of here! What
messages.messageBody:
D****d spammers! I see you've set the thing to moderate new member
posts and made their membership commit seppuku. Let's hope that keeps
them out of here! What gets me is their gall! "You recieved this
because you joined OUR group..." What do you mean OUR group?! You're
not a part of this group! YOU unsubscribe. Jerks...

Sorry. I just had a rough night at work and that ticked me off to no
end.

-MissBehavin
